name: NUCLEO-TECH
description:
Thank you for choosing to download Nucleo-Tech! Nucleo-Tech is a unique top-down shooter experience where you play as Marcus Leo, the vengeful CEO of Nucleo-Tech, as you take revenge on your sworn enemies using deadly and powerful weaponry. Wreak havoc on your foes and leave none standing in this epic top down shooter!

Features

-Full single-player experience

-12 action packed missions

-4 different boards

-Multiple gun unlocks

-Multiple outfit unlocks

-Multiple upgrades

-Create boards with Creativeplayer

If you enjoy Nucleo-Tech please be sure to let us know. Like us on Facebook and Twitter at Divided By Zero Laboratories. Don't like Nucleo-Tech? No problem, just let us know what we can do to make better games for you. Customers can email us at dividedbyzerolaboratories@gmail.com Thank you again for your purchase!
